bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with da pu shang sun 打撲傷損， injury from a blow . Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 67: 治打撲，頭破腦出，中風口噤方 , “Recipe to cure [injuries from] blows , with the head broken open and brain protruding, wind stroke and clenched jaw”. Da pu shang sun 打撲傷損 , injury from a blow [18]

Alternative Names da pu sun shang 打撲損傷 ; sun shang da pu 損傷打撲 ; da shang 打傷 ; da sun 打損 ; ou shang 毆傷 ; da pu 打撲 , [injury from] a blow. Pathological Condition of bodily injuries received from being hit. XSLSXDMF Recipe Entry hei wan zi 黑丸 子 , black pills: 治打撲傷損，驢馬跌墜，骨斷筋碎，百節疼痛 , “It cures injuries from blows , [injuries resulting from] falling from a donkey or horse, bone fractures and ruptured sinews, with all joints aching”.
